channel.title: gdb on JiansLife
channel.description: Recent content in gdb on JiansLife

item.title: Gdb Script
item.description: a sample example set pagination off set logging file gdb.output set logging on break xxxx.c:[line number] commands silent p p p eod bt c end run set logging off quit run : gdb -x gdb_script -args [program] [program arguments] reference: https://sdimitro.github.io/post/scripting-gdb/ https://sourceware.org/gdb/current/onlinedocs/gdb/Break-Commands.html
